writings.title: Hue You
writings.writing:
What you think, what you feel.
What you believe in and what believes in you.
Where your heart goes and where you take your heart.
Whether you are here or there.. Or nowhere.. Or maybe everywhere.
Whether you are a myth or reality.
It doesn’t Matter.
Whether you live for someone or allow somebody to live for you.
It doesn’t Matter.
Actually, that's not too apt. All these things do matter.
You don't.
What can happen if you leave today, right at this moment?
Sure, some will be hurt. But how many? 3? 4?
And for how long? Should they even suffer for whatever duration they force on themselves? What could be lost?
Two daughters? Two sisters? 4 gaping holes?
And for those 4 holes, these 4 people will push themselves in pain.. For what?

writings.title: 2 Dots
writings.writing:
What you think, what you feel.
What you believe in and what believes in you.
Where your heart goes and where you take your heart.
Whether you are here or there.. Or nowhere.. Or maybe everywhere.
Whether you are a myth or reality.
It doesn’t Matter.
Whether you live for someone or allow somebody to live for you.
It doesn’t Matter.
Actually, that's not too apt. All these things do matter.
You don't.
What can happen if you leave today, right at this moment?
Sure, some will be hurt. But how many? 3? 4?
And for how long? Should they even suffer for whatever duration they force on themselves? What could be lost?
Two daughters? Two sisters? 4 gaping holes?
And for those 4 holes, these 4 people will push themselves in pain.. For what?
